author: Baje_4

review: Simple plug and play. Perfect for me! I have the stick in one TV and the fire box in the other - no issues with either one. Although the fire box spoiled me on the voice search feature (but the stick is perfect for travel)!
author: pea

review: I am up to two of these now, one in the office and the other in the living room, and love them. I do not have cable service or even an antenna so all of my entertainment comes over the internet. With these I can use my TVs with no hassles and the way it integrates the service I subscribe to (Pandora, Prime, Netflix, etc) makes it even easier to use than my computer. While not near as powerful or feature rich as set top media centers or a full blown PC they are perfect for turning that old TV into a "smart tv" and are much cheaper.
author: T. ROBERTSON
